column1: Relatives and friends are respectfully invited to attend Olivia's Life Celebration on Wednesday June 17 from 6:00PM to 9:00PM at the William J. Leber Funeral Home
column3: Chester (908-879-3090).  A Funeral Mass will be offered on Thursday June 18 at 10:30AM at St. Lawrence R.C. Church in Chester followed by interment in Pleasant Hill Cemetery in Chester.
